# Day 5 - Earth

| Classical Elements ¼: Focus on the tangible and grounded. Map landforms, geology, soil, agriculture, elevation, or anything solid beneath your feet.

# Day 6 - Dimensions

| Map beyond 2D. Visualize data using 3D models, extrusions (building heights), depth, time (as a dimension), or an unconventional multivariate approach.

## Load Libraries

```{r}
library(pacman)
pacman :: p_load(tidyverse, sf, raster, rayshader, elevatr, rayvista)
```

## Bounding Box

```{r}
crsLONGLAT <- "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"

get_area_bbox <- function(){
    xmin <- -67.763466
    ymin <- -23.390804
    xmax <- -67.705444
    ymax <- -23.344643

    bbox <- sf::st_sfc(
        sf::st_polygon(
            list(
                cbind(
                    c(xmin, xmax, xmax, xmin, xmin),
                    c(ymin, ymin, ymax, ymax, ymin)
                )
            )
        ), crs = crsLONGLAT
    ) |> sf::st_as_sf()

    return(bbox)
}

lascar_bbox <- get_area_bbox()
```

### Volcán Lascar

```{r}
lascar_dem <- rayvista::plot_3d_vista(
    req_area = lascar_bbox,
    phi = 80,
    theta = 0,
    elevation_detail = 13,
    overlay_detail = 16,
    zscale = 1,
    solid = F,
    outlier_filter = .001,
    zoom = .65,
    windowsize = c(800, 800)
)

rayshader::render_snapshot(
    filename = "lascar.png",
    clear = T
)
```
